faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Find answers to common questions about our AI-powered image tools.

what-is.question: What is Picshot AI?
what-is.answer: Picshot AI is an online platform offering free AI-powered tools to edit, enhance, and create stunning images. From removing backgrounds to generating AI art, we simplify your creative workflow.

free.question: Are Picshot AI tools free to use?
free.answer: Yes! Picshot AI Free to use and you get three generations per day for each tool present on Picshot AI.

signup.question: Do I need to sign up to use the tools?
signup.answer: No, You don't need to sign up. Each tool is provided free of cost here, and you can use each tool 3 times a day only.

tools.question: What kind of AI tools does Picshot AI offer?

textToImage.question: Can I generate images from text?
textToImage.answer: Yes! Our AI Image Generator can create unique visuals based on text descriptions, perfect for creative projects or professional use.

bgRemover.question: Does the Background Remover work on all images?
bgRemover.answer: Yes, the Background Remover is designed to handle any image, delivering clean and precise results.

mobile.question: Are Picshot AI tools mobile-friendly?
mobile.answer: Our platform works seamlessly on desktop and mobile devices.

formats.question: What image formats are supported?
formats.answer: We support most common formats, including JPG, PNG, and BMP, for uploads and downloads.

speed.question: How quickly are the results generated?
speed.answer: Our AI tools deliver results within seconds, ensuring a fast and efficient editing process.

security.question: Is my data secure with Picshot AI?
security.answer: Yes, we prioritize your privacy and use secure encryption to protect your data. Uploaded images are not stored anywhere on our servers.

privacy.question: Will my images be used elsewhere?
privacy.answer: No, your images are processed securely and we don't store any of your images.

support.question: What should I do if the tool doesn't work as expected?
support.answer: You can contact our support via email support@picshotai.com. We'll help resolve your issue quickly.

AIImageGenerator.title: 100% Free Realistic AI Image Generator
AIImageGenerator.negativePromptPlaceholder: Specify things to not see in the output
AIImageGenerator.limitReachedDescription: Congrats! You have officially hit your image generation limit for today. No more magic for you. Try again tomorrow, if you can wait that long!
AIImageGenerator.promptError: Please provide a prompt for image generation.
AIImageGenerator.limitReachedError: You have reached the daily limit for image generation.

metadata.title: AI Image Generator | Create Stunning AI-Generated Images
metadata.description: Generate high-quality, AI-driven images effortlessly with our AI Image Generator. Perfect for artists, marketers, and content creators.

AIImageGeneratorPage.whatIsDescription: Our AI Image Generator is a cutting-edge tool that uses advanced artificial intelligence to create unique, high-quality images based on your text descriptions. It's perfect for artists, designers, marketers, and anyone looking to bring their ideas to life visually.
AIImageGeneratorPage.benefitsTitle: Benefits of Using Our AI Image Generator
AIImageGeneratorPage.timeSavingDescription: Generate complex images in seconds, saving hours of manual design work.
AIImageGeneratorPage.creativeFreedomDescription: Explore endless possibilities with AI-assisted image creation.
AIImageGeneratorPage.highQualityDescription: Produce professional-grade images suitable for various applications.
AIImageGeneratorPage.easyToUseDescription: No design skills required - just describe what you want to see.
AIImageGeneratorPage.versatileApplicationsDescription: Create images for social media, marketing, art projects, and more.
AIImageGeneratorPage.howToUseTitle: How to Use Our AI Image Generator
AIImageGeneratorPage.step1Description: Describe the image you want to create in detail. The more specific you are, the better the results.
AIImageGeneratorPage.step2Description: Select from portrait, landscape, or square formats to suit your needs.
AIImageGeneratorPage.step3Description: Click the 'Generate Image' button and wait for the AI to work its magic.
AIImageGeneratorPage.step4Description: Once generated, you can download your image and use it for your projects.
